languages.text: "Так я и не спорю. Но его законники порешали — не за их же победу стакан опорожнять?"
"I'm not claiming otherwise. But it was the lawmen who handled him — are you expecting me to drain a glass for their victory instead?"
languages.original_text: "Так я и не спорю. Но его законники порешали — не за их же победу стакан опорожнять?"

traits.locale_text: "I'm not claiming otherwise. But the lawmen have handled him — why not drain a glass for their victory?"
"I'm not claiming otherwise. But the lawmen have handled him — why not drain a glass for their victory?"
"I'm not claiming otherwise. But the lawmen have handled him — why not drain a glass for their victory?"
"I'm not claiming otherwise. But it was the lawmen who handled him — are you expecting me to drain a glass for their victory instead?"
"I'm not claiming otherwise. But it was the lawmen who handled him — are you expecting me to drain a glass for their victory instead?"

languages.text: 「それを否定するつもりはない。だが、片をつけてくれたのは法執行官たちだ。まさかその勝利を祝って俺が杯を傾けるとでも？」
languages.original_text: "I'm not claiming otherwise. But it was the lawmen who handled him — are you expecting me to drain a glass for their victory instead?"

traits.locale_text: 「それを否定するつもりはない。だが、片をつけてくれたのは法執行官たちだ。まさかその勝利を祝って俺が杯を傾けるとでも？」
「それを否定するつもりはない。だが、法執行官たちが片を付けてくれた。彼らの勝利に一杯やらないか？」

languages.text: "Ich behaupte nichts anderes. Aber es waren die Gesetzeshüter, die ihn abserviert haben – soll ich etwa stattdessen ein Glas auf ihren Sieg leeren?"
languages.original_text: "I'm not claiming otherwise. But it was the lawmen who handled him — are you expecting me to drain a glass for their victory instead?"

traits.locale_text: "Ich behaupte nichts anderes. Aber es waren die Gesetzeshüter, die ihn abserviert haben – soll ich etwa stattdessen ein Glas auf ihren Sieg leeren?"

languages.text: "Buna itirazım yok. Yine de kanuncular gereğini yaptı. Zaferlerine ithafen bir kadeh dikmemi mi bekliyorsun?"
languages.original_text: "I'm not claiming otherwise. But it was the lawmen who handled him — are you expecting me to drain a glass for their victory instead?"

traits.locale_text: "Buna itirazım yok. Yine de kanuncular gereğini yaptı. Zaferlerine ithafen bir kadeh dikmemi mi bekliyorsun?"
"Buna itirazım yok. Yine de kanuncular gereğini yaptı. Zaferlerine ithafen bir kadeh dikmekten zarar gelmez."

languages.text: «No lo disputo, pero los agentes del orden se han ocupado de él. ¿Me estás sugiriendo que brinde en su honor?».
languages.original_text: "I'm not claiming otherwise. But it was the lawmen who handled him — are you expecting me to drain a glass for their victory instead?"

traits.locale_text: «No lo disputo, pero los agentes del orden se han ocupado de él. ¿Me estás sugiriendo que brinde en su honor?».

languages.text: “他确实是个王八蛋，但干掉他的人是那群法务官。我不至于为那些人的胜利干杯吧？”
languages.original_text: "I'm not claiming otherwise. But it was the lawmen who handled him — are you expecting me to drain a glass for their victory instead?"

traits.locale_text: “他确实是个王八蛋，但干掉他的人是那群法务官。我不至于为那些人的胜利干杯吧？”
“他确实是个王八蛋，但那些法务官已经把他处理掉了。来为法务官的胜利干杯吧？”

languages.text: « Je ne dis pas le contraire. Mais ce sont les représentants de l'ordre qui l'ont rattrapé. Vous vous attendez à ce que je trinque en leur honneur ? »
languages.original_text: "I'm not claiming otherwise. But it was the lawmen who handled him — are you expecting me to drain a glass for their victory instead?"

traits.locale_text: « Je ne dis pas le contraire. Mais ce sont les représentants de l'ordre qui l'ont rattrapé. Vous vous attendez à ce que je trinque en leur honneur ? »
